title: OSS Elephpant HD
description: Respond to a distress call from the OSS Elephpant, a massive colony ship of peaceful techno-anarchists searching The Cloud for a new home. Use your knowledge of PHP to help the ship's embattled AI protect the colonsists, still deep in cryogenic sleep.

flavorTextOverrides.lockedDoor: This door seems to be locked.
flavorTextOverrides.lockedChest: A locked chest in a pristinely empty room.
flavorTextOverrides.cryoWorkbench: All occupied cryo status units are reporting 100% passing tests with total functional and high theoretical coverage. Live monitoring analysis confirms systems and occupant health throughout this reporting area.
flavorTextOverrides.riverwayFountain: The burbling water sounds musical and the stirred air smells fresh in the light spray. Here and there the dancing water catches the light; casting it into shimmering little rainbows.
flavorTextOverrides.notReady: Looks like this part of the simulation isn't ready yet. I should check back after a new TwilioQuest update.
